title: How do travel agents use technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends what the core product is that the travel agent sells. The role of the travel agent had both diminished and evolved over the past few years. The TA who sells airline seats use the service of one of the few GDS (global distribution service) companies like Sabre or Amadeus to access airline seat inventory. All of these have become accessible online and travel agents who keep abreast of technology and use the GDS also receive training from them on a regular basis.

Travel agents use the travel technology to grow their business and the requirement is as per the reach of customers to the travel companies. Some travel agents need the booking engine for flights only, some need for hotels only. This is all depends upon the work flow of the travel company.
